name: Cook and Feast
description: We are Giovanna and Marcus, a chef and butcher couple in West Dulwich. Giovanna was runner-up on Masterchef and Marcus has been a butcher for 14 years. We are delivering a range of high-welfare, premium meat boxes and a weekly supper club kit for you to assemble at home to replace our regular supper clubs during the lockdown. We deliver in temperature-controlled boxes on Wednesdays and Fridays. Cutoff is 4 pm, two days before delivery.
